text: Pavel Dmitriyevich Lelyukhin (; born 23 April 1998) is a Russian football player. He plays for Pafos in the First Division of Cyprus. ==Club career== He made his debut in the Russian Professional Football League for FC Dynamo-2 Moscow on 20 July 2016 in a game against FC Tekstilshchik Ivanovo. Lelyukhin played in the Russian Football National League with FC Spartak-2 Moscow.http://footballfacts.ru/players/1613503-lelyuhin On 4 September 2018 he signed with the Cypriot club Pafos. ==International== He was on the roster for the Russia national under-17 football team at the 2015 FIFA U-17 World Cup, but did not play in any games at the tournament. ==Career statistics== {| class=wikitable style="text-align: center;" |+ Appearances and goals by club, season and competition |- !rowspan=2|Club !rowspan=2|Season !colspan=3|League !colspan=2|Cup !colspan=2|Continental !colspan=2|Other !colspan=2|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |rowspan=3|Pafos |2018–19 |rowspan=2|Cypriot First Division |8||0||3||0||colspan=2|—||colspan=2|—||11||0 |- |2019–20 |10||0||2||0||colspan=2|—||colspan=2|—||12||0 |- !colspan="2"|Total !18!!0!!5!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!23!!0 |- !colspan=3|Career Total !18!!0!!5!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!23!!0 |} ==References== ==External links== * Profile by Russian Professional Football League Category:1998 births Category:Footballers from Moscow Category:Living people Category:Russian footballers Category:Russia youth international footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Association football midfielders Category:FC Dynamo Moscow reserves players Category:Pafos FC players Category:Russian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Cyprus
